data.name: My Dear Sister
data.detailed_description:
WELCOME TO FELLOWS FAMILY MANSION

After 10 years, Alice receives a letter from her lost twin sister Astrid, and now she stands in front of Fellows Family Mansion.
She looks at the letter and the family photo under the heavy rain, her childhood memories are so dark. Why she lost her twin sister? What was the secrets of Fellows Family? Why they left her to a foster family after Astrid’s disappearance?
On a dark November night, Alice should solve Astrid’s puzzles to find the answers of these questions.

My Dear Sister
It is a single player story horror game.
It is a game where players will progress by solving various puzzles and solve mysteries.
data.about_the_game:
WELCOME TO FELLOWS FAMILY MANSION

After 10 years, Alice receives a letter from her lost twin sister Astrid, and now she stands in front of Fellows Family Mansion.
She looks at the letter and the family photo under the heavy rain, her childhood memories are so dark. Why she lost her twin sister? What was the secrets of Fellows Family? Why they left her to a foster family after Astrid’s disappearance?
On a dark November night, Alice should solve Astrid’s puzzles to find the answers of these questions.

My Dear Sister
It is a single player story horror game.
It is a game where players will progress by solving various puzzles and solve mysteries.
data.short_description: My Dear Sister is a first-person story-driven mystery-horror game with puzzles and exploration experience. The game focuses on the secrets of Fellows Family and the story of twin sisters Alice and Astrid.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or Ryzen 3 series, 3GHz or faster
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 550
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
